content.raw:
Should I be using a different branch of ign-fuelui now? I tried:

1. Get this branch with the latest changes
1. I had to run `npm run update` to generate an updated `gz3d.lib.js` - *action needed*: update this PR with the latest generated file
1. Pulled the most recent version of your `ign-fuelui` branch, but there were no changes
1. So I copied the newly generated file into ign-fuelui
1. The 3D view looks broken, is there a new branch on fuelui which I should try?
content.html:
Should I be using a different branch of ign-fuelui now? I tried:

  1. Get this branch with the latest changes
  2. I had to run npm run update to generate an updated gz3d.lib.js - action needed: update this PR with the latest generated file
  3. Pulled the most recent version of your ign-fuelui branch, but there were no changes
  4. So I copied the newly generated file into ign-fuelui
  5. The 3D view looks broken, is there a new branch on fuelui which I should try?
